altername_name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters III: Tri Holy God Advant
游戏王3 三圣战神降临
name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Dark Duel Stories
overview: Based on the hit animated TV show, Yu-Gi-Oh! Dark Duel Stories features all of your favorite characters from the series. Partaking in the Duel Monsters card game, the player must gain cards and experience to become the strongest duelist in the world. Create a customized deck out of 10,000 possible cards and duel against Tristan, Kaiba, Yugi, Pegasus and others. The best duelists will go on to challenge the four Rulers of the Heavens? keepers of the sacred Millennium Items. Win battles to earn cards, trade with friends, import cards from the official card game or even create your own with the construction feature in order to complete your collection.
